cells.data:
1. Connect to VPN
2. Update player-guide, dangerzone, oauth-guide, video.js, topperharley
3. Check dates of updated files and move new .md files into corresponding folder
   in git > BCL-Content > docs > en > video-cloud > updates-raw

File Associations
=================
Home Page Name
     Path
     Source Doc

Overview
     en/video-cloud/players/index.html
     player-guide/userguide.md

Player Tour
     en/video-cloud/players/playertour.html
     player-guide/playertour.md

Plugin Tour
     en/video-cloud/players/plugin-tour.html
     player-guide/plugin-tour.md

Player Mgmt API                  
     en/video-cloud/player-management-api/PlayerManagement.html
     topperharley/docs/userguide.md

Delivery System API
     en/video-cloud/delivery-system-api/DeliverySystem.html
     dangerzone/userguide.md

oauth Setup
     en/video-cloud/players/OAuth.html
     oauth-guide/userguide.html

Player API
     WebPlayerAPI/index.html
     video.js/docs/index.md (get all md files)

FROM David LP: Most of the WITMTN work post Christmas has been on github: https://github.com/videojs/videojs-contrib-hls. Before Christmas we were working on https://bithub.brightcove.com/videocloud/videojs-ima3

                                                                     
URLs for source to check updated docs
=====================================
https://bithub.brightcove.com/videocloud/player-guide
https://bithub.brightcove.com/videocloud/topperharley
https://bithub.brightcove.com/videocloud/dangerzone
https://github.com/videojs/video.js/tree/master/docs
     -IMPORTANT: If you update index.html from video.js, you must change the links in the doc from .md docs to .html docs
https://bithub.brightcove.com/videocloud/oauth-guide

4. If a file needs to be updated
     -Convert the .md file to HTML saving in RAW folder
     -From new HTML file copy from <h1> to just above </body>
     -Paste into corresponding doc file, placing copied HTML under <div id="top"...>
     to just above the first of the three </div>s
     -IMPORTANT: If you update index.html from video.js, you must change the links in the doc from .md docs to .html docs
    
5. Clear out all RAW folders (not needed any longer and just in the way for next time)
6. Disconnect from VPN

CHECKS
========

Updated 23 Oct


Updated 29 Oct
ALL video.js docs (restructured)

Updated 3 Dec


Updated 12 Dec
